column5: police arrested a suspect for using and distributing narcotics and stealing around Veal Veng district
column9: a 23-year-old male was finally caught after police tracked him to his hideaway
column10: tunneled  in a thicket of bamboo in the forest.------After detaining the suspect
column11: he was forwarded to the Krakor district police inspector and will be sent to provincial police for legal action.------ POST NEWS
